text: Bosnia and Herzegovina competed in the Winter Olympic Games as an independent nation for the first time at the 1994 Winter Olympics in Lillehammer, Norway. Previously, Bosnian and Herzegovinian athletes competed for Yugoslavia at the Olympic Games. == Alpine skiing== ;Men {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete
